meanings.sent1: She was the bashfullest girl in the class, always blushing when called on.
meanings.sent2: The bashfullest kitten in the litter hid behind its mother.
meanings.sent3: The bashfullest squirrel hesitated before approaching the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: The bashfullest flower in the garden seemed to shrink away from the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: His bashfullest smile revealed his nervousness.

meanings.sent1: He was the bashfullest student to volunteer for the presentation.
meanings.sent2: The bashfullest child at the party clung to their parent's leg.
meanings.sent3: The bashfullest shopper took forever to decide on a flavor of ice cream.
meanings.sent4: The bashfullest cloud seemed unsure whether to release rain or not.
meanings.sent5: The bashfullest driver at the intersection waited for everyone else to go first.
